name: PolyGun (itch) (JOH.dev423)
description: You are a retard soldier from WWV and an apocalypse broke out and you have to fight your way to figure out what to do. This game is a shooter and/horror-game you have to fight mutated animals. this is still in DEV.01 so do not expect much from it it. This Game does not have the best graphics and this is my first real publish game I hope you enjoy. more instructions down below.
